sense.def:
Mockery
so besede, vedenje ali mnenja, ki so neprijazna in prezirljiva.

seg.quote: There was a tone of mockery in his voice.

sense.def:
Kadar opišemo dogodek ali položaj kot
a mockery
, hočemo reči, da se nam zdi neuspešen ali ničvreden.

seg.quote: The strikers were making a mockery of our efforts to build up employment.
